posts.post_content:
Up for sale is a T206 Larry Doyle (portrait) in VG condition.  The card exhibits near perfect centering and great colors and registration.

$XX paypal gift (shipping is on me).  First to PM me or email me at [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] with an "I'll take it" will be the new owner.

See scans below for condition.

[img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T206_Doyle.jpg[/IMG][img]http://photos.imageevent.com/derekgranger/personal/websize/T206_Doyle%20_back_.jpg[/IMG]
